title: G-Type St. Bride's Magazine spread
content:
Simon Loxley, the editor of the journal of St Bride Library ’Ultrabold’, very kindly offered a me carte blanche opportunity to design a spread for the journal. So if you want to see some self-indulgent twaddle and blatant advertising masquerading as editorial content have a gander at this:
